projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce application with user authentication, product management, shopping cart, and payment integration. Built with modern web technologies.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management tool with real-time updates, team workspaces, and project tracking. Features drag-and-drop functionality and notifications.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather application that provides current conditions, forecasts, and historical data. Features location search and interactive charts.

projects.title: AI Chat Assistant
projects.description: An intelligent chatbot powered by natural language processing. Supports multiple conversation contexts and learns from user interactions.

projects.title: Social Media Dashboard
projects.description: Analytics dashboard for social media management with data visualization, scheduling, and performance metrics across multiple platforms.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker
projects.description: A comprehensive fitness tracking application with workout logging, progress tracking, and personalized goal setting features.
